data_table.description: Subject ID, participating in AABC, case or control status, gender, age at diagnosis of breast cancer, and presence of estrogen receptors among participants with or without breast cancer and involved in the "African American Breast Cancer GWAS" project.

variable.name: STATUS
variable.comment: Case has breast cancer diagnosis; control does not

variable.name: AGE_CAT
variable.description: Age at diagnosis for cancer cases, age at blood draw for controls
variable.comment: Age at diagnosis for cancer cases, age at blood draw for controls

variable.name: FH_BCA
variable.description: Family history of breast cancer (sister or mother) reported at baseline

variable.name: ER_STATUS
variable.comment: This variable will be missing for control subjects
